Panama's top court rejects ex-president Martinelli's appeal to annul prison sentencePanama's top court rejected former president and current presidential candidate Ricardo Martinelli's appeal to annul a 10-year prison sentence, a court official said on Friday, casting doubt on Martinelli's ability to run in the May election. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:55:59 GMT 74I4DY6JYRKWXG5MNFG2GXDNV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/panamas-top-court-rejects-ex-president-martinellis-appeal-annul-prison-sentence-2024-02-02/Reuters世界美洲
Malta PM turns up at farmers’ protest to hear complaintsFarmers in Malta staging a demonstration on Friday against EU agricultural policies as part of Europe-wide protests were surprised when Prime Minister Robert Abela turned up in person to hear their complaints. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:53:06 GMT 2FSGBTN4FFL77FTULBAZKHVC4U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/malta-pm-turns-up-farmers-protest-hear-complaints-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Poland extends border controls with Slovakia to stem illegal migrationPoland has extended border controls with Slovakia until March 2 to try to stop illegal migrants entering from Slovak territory, the interior ministry said on Friday. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:43:24 GMT XVHKTQRC4FMYTIXXHPONXYFWI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/poland-extends-border-controls-with-slovakia-stem-illegal-migration-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
US issues new Iran-related sanctions for cyber, arms activityThe U.S. Treasury said on Friday it had imposed sanctions on a four Iran- and Hong-Kong based companies for providing materials and technology to Iran's ballistic missile and drone programs and on a Hong Kong-based firm for selling Iranian commodities. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:41:40 GMT IN75BJ7UXZKJZEMYRUCC7RHA7E https://www.reuters.com/world/us-issues-new-iran-lated-sanctions-cyber-arms-activity-2024-02-02/Reuters世界
Satellite images show 30% of Gaza destroyed, UN centre saysSatellite imagery analysed by the United Nations Satellite Centre shows that 30% of Gaza Strip's buildings have been destroyed or damaged in the Israel offensive in the densely populated Palestinian enclave. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:35:48 GMT BP2SI3EXY5IC7DHFN3ZIQKRCOA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/satellite-images-show-30-gaza-destroyed-un-centre-says-2024-02-02/Reuters世界中东
­­Climate activist Greta Thunberg acquitted after London protest trialClimate activist Greta Thunberg was on Friday cleared of a public order offence over a protest outside an oil and gas conference last year, after a judge in a London court ruled she had no case to answer. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:22:57 GMT YXZ6UM3PZ5NRDCV6F3H4XDTERM https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/climate-activist-greta-thunberg-acquitted-after-london-protest-trial-2024-02-02/Reuters世界英国
World Court rules Russia-Ukraine genocide case can go forwardJudges at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Friday ruled that the case Ukraine started accusing Russia of violating international law by accusing Ukraine of genocide can move forward. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 15:09:35 GMT IJSD7BXVQVJLZOSA2FVGXQOCME https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/world-court-rules-Russia-ukraine-genocide-case-can-go-forward-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
Who is Michelle O'Neill, Northern Ireland's incoming first minister?Michelle O'Neill will become the new leader of Northern Ireland's regional government on Saturday, the most significant milestone yet in the shift to a new generation of Irish nationalists not directly involved in the region's decades-long bloody conflict. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:31:54 GMT DVGC2B7VN5LABLPVL3LXQU36WA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/michelle-oneill-northern-irelands-incoming-first-minister-2024-02-02/Reuters世界英国
EU imposes sanctions against five Guatemalans for undermining democracyThe European Union on Friday imposed sanctions against five individuals from Guatemala for undermining democracy, the rule of law or the peaceful transfer of power in Central America's most populous nation. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:10:59 GMT YRH2P5K3RRLNRKIQGVOIGJR3DQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/eu-imposes-sanctions-against- Five-guatemalans-undermining-democracy-2024-02-02/Reuters世界美洲
Indian Muslim leaders urge government to end mosque-temple disputesTop Muslim leaders in India called on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government on Friday to end disputes over mosques and Hindu temples, saying the minority Muslim population was feeling under threat and their places of worship should be protected. Fri, 02 Feb 2024 14:08:59 GMT 7AZFOHLBGBKX7IA2GYTARLFMLY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-muslim-leaders-urge-government-end-mosque-temple-disputes-2024-02-02/Rupam Jain世界印度
Lawyer for Russian dissident Navalny put on wanted list - RIARussia's interior ministry has put a lawyer for jailed Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny on its wanted list after charging her in absentia with extremism, the RIA news agency reported Fri, 02 Feb 2024 13:35:34 GMT YBJDLM2ISBIH7KDKMTGJOOYOXY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/lawyer- Russian-dissident-navalny-put-wanted-list-ria-2024-02-02/Reuters世界欧洲
